verses.verse: And it came to pass, when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, that the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H7194>knit<s%> with the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him as his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

¶ And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, saying, <S%H1696>Commune<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3909>secretly<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Behold, the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H2654>delight<s%> in thee, and all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> thee: now therefore be the <S%H4428>king's<s%> son in <S%H2859>law<s%>.
